skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bollywood dhamaal
Developer Terms of Use
des:
If you are the kind of person who loves the Bollywood industry and want to test your knowledge across the movie dialogues then my friend, this skill takes you through the journey. From the early days of Bollywood to today, this game contains all the coolest, funniest, and most memorable dialogues that any true Bollywood fan should recognize. The user has to correctly identify the movie name corresponding to a particular dialogue.
Consider yourself a Bollywood guru or want to be one? Play the hottest and latest Bollywood Hungama skill on Alexa now.
priv:

The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
